text:
ready player one (book is much better than the movie)
A Heartbreaking Work of Staggering Genius
A Confederacy of Dunces
Weapons of Math Destruction

> ready player one (book is much better than the movie)
This is the understatement of the year. Book was the shit. Movie was shit.
i found it to be a nice light read.  wasnt anything groundbreaking.
and please, tell me how you really feel :wink:
I actually listened to Ready Player Two after the first movie came out :stuck_out_tongue:
Too bad HubSpot api documentation is not on Audible
I bet the movie if that would be great too
Already has sequels in book form

I’m not 100% sure this is what you’re talking about, but you could create links as part of a campaign. Then you would just create a tracking URL from there. You’d see everything from in the campaign view. Does that answer your question?
